Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review feedback on the drafted updates to training materials.
Finalize updates to training materials based on the feedback received.
Take a break and briefly check personal interests online.
Update support documentation in conjunction with the finalized training materials.
Email @Trainer and @Quality Assurance Tester to inform them about the updates made to the training materials and documentation.
Prepare for training sessions that may be required post-updating the training materials.
Set up a meeting for later in the week with @Training Coordinator to discuss the implementation of training sessions.
Review any remaining support tickets and respond as needed.
